overview: The Postpartum Reconditioning health plan is designed specifically for new mothers aiming to restore their core strength and recover pelvic floor muscles. Our approach to fitness is gentle and progressive, starting with low-impact exercises suitable for beginners and gradually increasing in intensity over a 12-week period.

global_rules.title: Safety First
global_rules.text: Begin exercise 6-8 weeks postpartum with medical clearance

global_rules.title: Core Safety
global_rules.text: Stop any exercise that causes doming or bulging in the abdominal area

global_rules.title: Progression
global_rules.text: Progress gradually and listen to your body

conditioning_and_recovery: Focus on gentle movement and recovery
Include 10-15 minutes of daily mobility work
Listen to your body and rest when needed

nutrition.goal: Support recovery and healing with adequate protein and nutrients
timing_and_training_day_setup: 2-3 hours before exercise: Balanced meal with protein and carbohydrates
Within 2 hours after exercise: Protein and carbohydrates for recovery
Eat every 3-4 hours to maintain stable energy levels
